item.title: Bringing your project to the people
item.description: Hi, I’m Adam “Gahlammon” Dachtera, team leader and designer of Bullet Waste project, here to tell you a word or two about our experience with presenting our game on a conference and how it impacted the way we think about creating this project. Showtime Kolejna Konferencja, Bydgoszcz, 13th of April Let’s start from the end, the conference itself. The day we went there, I was so glad that we made it.

item.title: So you want to have 5k active bullets at once...
item.description: Why As you may know Bullet Waste is a first-person bullet-hell game, which means spawning a lot of bullets at runtime. Furthermore, a game designer needs to be able to define complicated attacks with ease. This task was assigned to me and I think I’ve come up with a pretty interesting solution. But how to tackle this This problem (as many others) consists of many smaller ones. But for the sake of this article lets focus on the main two:
